column1: ·         chloe,lottie,"I saw a really cute puppy at the park today! It was so playful and adorable.",January 18 at 8:23pm
·         lottie,chloe,OMG! I love puppies! What breed was it?,January 18 at 8:33pm
·         chloe,lottie,I think it was a golden retriever. So fluffy!,January 18 at 8:40pm
·         lottie,chloe,Aww! I want one now!,January 27 at 11:02pm
·         chloe,lottie,You should totally get one!,January 27 at 11:06pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Maybe I'll ask my parents. But they might say no because of the shedding.",January 27 at 11:10pm
·         chloe,lottie,True. But they’re so worth it!,January 27 at 11:14pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Yeah, I'll think about it. They're just so cute!",January 27 at 11:16pm
·         lottie,chloe,OMG! You know that puppy I saw at the park? I saw it again today!,January 28 at 10:01am
·         chloe,lottie,No way! Did you get to pet it?,January 28 at 10:04am
·         lottie,chloe,Yes! It was so friendly and sweet!,January 28 at 10:07am
·         chloe,lottie,I’m so jealous! How old is it?,January 28 at 10:10am
·         lottie,chloe,"About three months, I think. It's so tiny!",January 28 at 10:12am
·         chloe,lottie,Did you see its owner?,January 28 at 10:15am
·         lottie,chloe,"Yeah, they were really nice too. They said I could visit anytime!",January 28 at 10:18am
·         chloe,lottie,That’s awesome! Maybe you can puppy-sit!,January 28 at 10:22am
·         jack,lottie,"Hi Lottie, did you get home okay last night?",January 28 at 3:45pm
·         lottie,jack,Yes. Thanks for asking.,January 28 at 3:56pm
·         jack,lottie,"No problem. What are you up to this weekend?",January 28 at 4:01pm
·         lottie,jack,"Nothing much, just hanging out. How about you?",January 28 at 4:10pm
·         jack,lottie,"Same here. Maybe we could meet up?",January 28 at 4:13pm
·         lottie,jack,That sounds great!,January 28 at 4:20pm
·         jack,lottie,"Cool, I’ll message you soon. Looking forward to it!",January 28 at 4:23pm
·         lottie,chloe,Jack and I are meeting up this weekend!,January 28 at 4:27pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Oooh, that sounds fun! What are you going to do?",January 28 at 4:35pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Not sure yet, but it should be fun!",January 28 at 4:39pm
·         chloe,lottie,Definitely! Have a great time!,January 28 at 4:43pm
·         lottie,chloe,"Thanks! I’m really excited about it.",January 28 at 4:50pm
·         chloe,lottie,"Yeah, it's always nice to have plans! Let me know how it goes.",January 28 at 4:55pm
·         lottie,chloe,Will do! I hope it’s as fun as I imagine.,January 28 at 5:01pm
·         jack,lottie,"Morning Lottie, how are you today?",January 29 at 9:55am
·         lottie,jack,"I'm good, thanks! How about you?",January 29 at 10:05am
·         jack,lottie,"I’m good too. Just thinking about our weekend plans.",January 29 at 10:07am
·         lottie,jack,Me too! What time should we meet?,January 29 at 10:10am
·         jack,lottie,"How about 3 PM?",January 29 at 10:12am
·         lottie,jack,Sounds good to me!,January 29 at 10:16am
·         jack,lottie,Great! See you then.,January 29 at 10:18am
·         lottie,jack,Can’t wait!,January 29 at 10:20am
·         jack,lottie,Me neither. See you soon!,January 29 at 10:22am
·         lottie,chloe,"Guess what! Jack and I are meeting at 3 PM this weekend!",January 29 at 10:30am
·         chloe,lottie,"That’s awesome! You’re going to have a blast!",January 29 at 10:41am
·         lottie,chloe,"I hope so! Thanks for being so supportive.",January 29 at 10:45am
·         chloe,lottie,"Of course! That's what friends are for.",January 29 at 10:48am
·         lottie,chloe,You’re the best!,January 29 at 10:55am
·         chloe,lottie,Anytime!,January 29 at 10:58am
·         lottie,chloe,"I’m really looking forward to it. I hope everything goes well!",January 29 at 11:02am
·         chloe,lottie,"It will, don’t worry!",January 29 at 11:05am
·         lottie,chloe,Thanks!,January 29 at 11:07am

·         jack,lottie,Had such a great time yesterday. Wish we could hang out more.,February 1 at 7:01pm
·         lottie,jack,"Me too. Sorry I had to leave early.",February 1 at 7:15pm
·         jack,lottie,"No worries. Just wish we had more time together.",February 1 at 7:19pm
·         lottie,jack,You’re sweet.,February 1 at 7:21pm
·         jack,lottie,When can we meet again?,February 1 at 7:25pm
·         lottie,jack,Maybe this weekend?,February 1 at 7:28pm
·         jack,lottie,"Saturday works. I really wanted to kiss you yesterday, but I wasn’t sure.",February 1 at 7:33pm
·         lottie,jack,blushing,February 1 at 7:40pm
·         jack,lottie,So can we make it a date for a kiss on Saturday?,February 1 at 7:43pm
·         lottie,jack,Yes. I’d like that.,February 1 at 7:49pm
·         jack,lottie,Great :) xxx,February 1 at 7:52pm
·         jack,lottie,"Hi Lottie, how are you? I can't stop thinking about you. You’re amazing.",February 2 at 8:03pm
·         lottie,jack,I’m good. Thinking about you too.,February 2 at 8:10pm
·         jack,lottie,What sort of things are you thinking?,February 2 at 8:14pm

·         jack,lottie,Of course. You are beautiful.,February 2 at 8:23pm
